items.title: Certified Lean Management Professional
items.headline: Applications of Lean and Toyota Production System Tools
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be able to strategically implement the tools and techniques of Lean management.

This course provides the in depth learning of all the concepts, tools and techniques of Lean management such as: Value Stream Mapping, 7 wastes, 3Ms, Kaizen, Kanban, Poka Yoke, SMED, One piece flow, Line stoppage, Andon, Autonomation, JIT, JIDOKA etc.

items.title: Combo Lean Six Sigma Green and Black Belts
items.headline: Based on ASQ Body of Knowledge
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will understand and apply the concepts of Six Sigma strategy to achieve high accuracy and precision in critical processes.
Become a Six Sigma manager and help industries to reduce operations cost and achieve high levels of customer satisfaction and loyalty
